resources.string: PREFIX iot: <http://campus.guide/OpenIoT/owl#> PREFIX w3ct: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?propertyClass WHERE { <%s> iot:roomProperty ?property . ?property w3ct:type ?propertyClass . FILTER (?propertyClass != iot:Property) . FILTER (?propertyClass != iot:Thing) . }

PREFIX iot: <http://campus.guide/OpenIoT/owl#> PREFIX w3ct: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?propertyClass WHERE { <%s> iot:roomProperty ?propertyClass . ?propertyClass w3ct:type <%s> }

PREFIX iot: <http://campus.guide/OpenIoT/owl#> PREFIX w3c: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?propertyClass WHERE { ?propertyClass w3c:subClassOf iot:Property . FILTER (?propertyClass != iot:Property) . FILTER (?propertyClass != iot:Thing) . }
